content.text:
# 17th Canadian Folk Music Awards

The 17th Canadian Folk Music Awards were presented on April 3, 2022, to honour achievements in folk music by Canadian artists in 2021.
Nominees and recipients
{| class=wikitable width="100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Contemporary Album
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Braden Gates, Kitchen Days'
*Fred Eaglesmith and Tif Ginn, Alive
*Shane Cook and the Woodchippers, Be Here for a While
*Grosse Isle, Le bonhomme Sept Heures / The Bonesetter
*David Boulanger, Les sessions du Vices & Versa (15th Anniversary)
| valign="top" |
* 'Allison Russell, Outside Child'
*Beyries, Encounter
*Craig Cardiff, All This Time Running
*Rick Fines, Solar Powered Too
*David Leask, Voyageur in Song
*Rob Lutes, Come Around
*Ryland Moranz, XO, 1945
*Reney Ray, ''À l'ouest du réel''
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Children's Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Singer
|-
| valign="top" |

| valign="top" |

*Sophie Lavoie, Le bonhomme Sept Heures / The Bonesetter
